name: Chimichurri
keywords: chimichurri, argentinian sauce, steak sauce, fresh herb sauce, parsley sauce, no-cook sauce, condiment, marinade, grilled meats, south american cuisine, easy sauce recipe, quick condiment, herbaceous, tangy, spicy, garlic sauce, olive oil sauce, red wine vinegar, fresh parsley, fresh oregano, gluten-free, vegan
description: A vibrant and flavorful Argentinian condiment, this classic chimichurri is made with finely chopped fresh parsley, oregano, garlic, and chili. Brought together with olive oil and red wine vinegar, it creates a tangy, herbaceous, and slightly spicy sauce that is the perfect accompaniment for grilled steak, chicken, or fish.

recipeInstructions.text: Mince the garlic. Finely chop the parsley, oregano and chili. Mix everything together and season with pepper and salt to taste. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Mix it all

notes: Great and simple condiment that I love to use with steak, chicken, salmon, etc etc.
